the_Manor

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • the_Manor.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

    The Game class is a superclass interacting with all other classes. It is called within the windows class for graphic interactions

    Version:
    05/12/16
    Author:
    Group 6

      • verifyResponseForEnigma

        public boolean verifyResponseForEnigma(java.lang.String response,
                                       java.lang.String direction)
        Allows to checks if the answer to the enigma is true of not.
        Parameters:
        response - The response given by the player.
        direction - The direction of the door.
        Returns:
        A boolean to say if the answer is good (True: good ; False: not good).
